_meta.name: JT30
_meta.description: Acid Bass Synth - 303-style monosynth with resonant filter. Accent boosts both cutoff AND resonance for authentic squelch.

waveform.hint: oscillator waveform - saw is brighter/aggressive, square is hollow/rounder

cutoff.hint: filter cutoff - keep LOW so envelope can open it dramatically

resonance.hint: filter resonance - accent will boost this for squelch

envMod.hint: filter envelope depth - how much envelope opens the filter

decay.hint: filter envelope decay - longer = more dramatic 'wow'

accent.hint: accent intensity - boosts volume, cutoff AND resonance
